abstract: The Occupy London movement does not yet have concrete aims, but it does appear to have deep, and eclectic, philosophical underpinning.
snippet: The Occupy London movement does not yet have concrete aims, but it does appear to have deep, and eclectic, philosophical underpinning.
lead_paragraph: The Occupy London movement does not yet have concrete aims, but it does appear to have some deep, and eclectic, philosophical underpinnings.

headline.main: The Ideas Behind a Move to 'Occupy London'
